Package wellen

Class HarmonicTable

java.lang.Object
wellen.HarmonicTable
public class HarmonicTable extends Object
"The Harmonic Table note-layout, or tonal array, is a key layout for musical instruments that offers interesting advantages over the traditional keyboard layout."

@REF(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harmonic_table_note_layout)
